title: Wanderlust: Geng Jakkarin in Bangkok for CONVERSE
content:
Geng with a tall kickflip off a bump over a pole at one of Bangkok’s iconic spots.

As part of our far east coverage, this installment of Wanderlust comes all the way from Bangkok, Thailand. While you may not be familiar with the name Geng Jakkarin yet, Geng is one of Asia’s most stylish skateboarders and has been quietly making waves in his native Thailand and also turning heads in sojourns to China, Singapore and even as far afield as New York City.

Geng with a fully loaded smith.

A longtime rider for Preduce, Geng has been putting in work over the years as evidenced in his multiple parts in the Preduce videos. This latest video features Geng skating around Bangkok as part of a tie-in for the Converse CONS One Star Pro shoe. As usual, Geng adopts a minimalist approach choosing clean lines with lots of style and the spots choices definitely shine here. I’m pretty sure you’ll want to stop off in Thailand to skate after seeing some of these spots! Peep the video below. – HK

Geng rides for Preduce Skateboards, Converse CONS, and Billabong.

Filmed and edited by Janchai Montrelerdrasme.
